title: Cooks in clover
creator_credit: Dennis Shand, Gas Council and Film Workshop
brief_description: Traces the regional origins of traditional British food, and shows how anyone interested in cooking can recreate the sumptuous fare of the past by the use of modern techniques in cooking. Demonstrates how to obtain perfect results when preparing Dover Sole, Melton Mowbray Pork Pie and the Roast Beef of Old England with comparative ease.
